member.name: T:System.FileSystem.FileSystemObject

member.name: M:System.FileSystem.FileSystemObject.BuildPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends a name to an existing path to create a new path.
member.param: A path to which name is appended. It can be absolute or relative.
Name being appended to the existing path.

member.name: M:System.FileSystem.FileSystemObject.CopyFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies one or more files from one location to another. Any existing files are overwritten.
member.param: File to be copied (can include wildcards).
Where the file or files from source are to be copied.

member.name: M:System.FileSystem.FileSystemObject.CopyFile(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copies one or more files from one location to another.
member.param: File to be copied (can include wildcards).
Where the file or files from source are to be copied.
Indicates if existing files are to be overwritten.

member.name: M:System.FileSystem.FileSystemObject.CopyFolder(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Recursively copies a folder from one location to another. Any existing folders and files are overwritten.
member.param: Folder top be copied (can include wildcards).
Where the specified folders are to be copied.

member.summary: Recursively copies a folder from one location to another.
member.param: Folder top be copied (can include wildcards).
